title: Thermarest logo font - ID help?
content:
I’m sure this has been customized, but I’d like to know what font they started with. It looks familiar, but I haven’t been able to put my finger on it. Any thoughts appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [thermarest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091128072240/http:/typophile.com/files/thermarest.jpg) | 34.31 KB |
author: Scott Richardson

comments.content:
I think [Castle](http://web.archive.org/web/20091128072240/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/castle/) might be close as a starting point.

- Mike Yanega
